The Oblitercons/Zergling/Punch/Oinker/Unitron/Serpentor:



Two more shots from Sniper struck Oblitertron, the behometh ignoring 
it as they dug into his armor.  He fired off two more blasts from his 
rifle at the Ark, seeing four Alliance members leave the Ark.

All accounted for, Dark One was barely able to take full control.  
The Oblitercons detached, landing perfectly, joining Punch, Zergling, 
Oinker, Serpentor, and Unitron in a quickly paced run.
